name: Sierra Core
desc:
An AI core of unknown design and purpose. Thickly insulated cables are attached, of a make you've never seen before.

It gives off a variety of signals. Some are exact matches for those given off by phase technology - anchors, skimmers, weaponry, the sort. The rest are impossible for any sensor packages in your fleet to properly identify, resulting in nonsense readings, unreadable user interfaces and uneasy crew.
